newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil's Feb home appliance sales up 10.45 pct.
newsitem.headline: Brazil's Feb home appliance sales up 10.45 pct.

text.p: The volume of Brazilian home appliance sales jumped 10.45 percent in February versus the same month last year, home appliance makers association Eletros said.

February sales, in terms of units sold, also rose 18.0 percent against January due to seasonal reasons, it said. In the first two months of 1997, home appliance sales have risen 6.5 percent over the same period last year.

Eletros added that white goods sales rose 11.0 percent against February 1996 while stereo sales rose 11.3 percent and portable appliance sales eased 1.9 percent when compared to the same month last year, it added.
